# init(title:)

**Initializer**

Creates a navigation item with the specified title.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(title: String)
```

## Parameters

- **title**: The string to set as the navigation item’s title displayed in the center of the navigation bar.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem] object initialized with the specified title.

## Discussion

This is the designated initializer for this class.

## Related Documentation

- **title**: The navigation item’s title that displays in the navigation bar.

## Initializing an item

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a navigation item from data in an unarchiver.

items.description: The navigation item’s title that displays in the navigation bar.
items.name: title

items.description: Creates a navigation item from data in an unarchiver.
items.name: init(coder:)

title: init(title:)
